Lightly adapted for adv3Lite by Eric Eve TADS 3 Library - scoring This module defines objects related to keeping track of the player's score, which indicates the player's progress through the game.

addToScore (points, desc)

score.t[327]

Add points to the total score. This is a convenience function that simply calls libScore.addToScore\_().
